page.title: 18A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: On Saturday morning I wake up in my bed and lie there looking around for a few minutes.Then I switch my little lamp on and get my book out of the drawer.Then at 07.30 I go downstairs and watch the television. When my family get up we have breakfast.I have toast. After breakfast I go upstairs and get ready for orchestra.I brush my teeth, wash my hands and face,then I get dressed into my jeans and jumper. Then I go downstairs and get my violin.My sister Tina gets her cello, then we get into our car and Dad drives us to the Pingle School at Swadlincote. We go into a room and put up some music stands.Orchestra starts at 10.15 and finishes at 11.15.We go back home in the car.Then we have our dinner,
